title: FS: 1887 Old Judge N172 W.C. Crossley SGC 84
author: calvindog

posts.post_title: FS: 1887 Old Judge N172 W.C. Crossley SGC 84
posts.post_content:
Very rare Old Judge card -- and by far the highest graded of all examples of this card: there are 7 different cards for William Crossley in SGC and PSA pop reports -- and the next highest grade in any of the cards is an SGC 60.  $1550.  If interested email or PM me, thanks.


[URL="http://www.flickr.com/photos/calvindog/2922483452/"][IMG]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3024/2922483452_b9c76b81aa_o.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
That is one beautiful card, Jeff. Good luck with it.
What an amazing card!!! I am currently thinking about buying it, so I'll let you know if I decide to.

Thanks all!

(And the more I look at it..the more I like it...hmmm)
